assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The course will deal with the basics of economic policies, history and formation of economic theories, and the formation of modern economics and social structure.
description.et: Käsitletakse majanduspoliitikate põhialuseid, majandusteooriate ajalugu ja kujunemist ning tänapäevase majanduse ning ühiskonnakorralduse kujunemist.

objectives.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the formation of different economic theories and policies, acting mechanisms of economics, the formation of the modern economy and social organization, and the role of the local level in economic issues.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on tutvustada erinevate majandusteooriate ja -poliitikate kujunemist, majanduse toimemehhanisme, kaasaaegse majanduse ja ühiskonnakorralduse kujunemist ning kohaliku tasandi rolli majandusküsimustes.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who has passed the course:
*	Has an overview of the general acting mechanisms and basics of economy;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Ülevaadet majanduse peamistest toimemehhanismidest ja põhialustest;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knows the system and basic concepts of economic policy;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Majanduspoliitika alaseid põhimõisteid ja majanduspoliitika süsteemi;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knows the history and formation of economic theory and the basic concepts of different economic orders;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Majandusteooria ajalugu ja kujunemist ning erinevate majanduskordade majanduspoliitika alaseid põhimõisteid;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knows the roles of the institutions that shape a country's economic policy;
*	Is knowledgeable about local municipalities' economic role and local economic policies;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Omab teadmisi kohalike omavalitsuste majanduslikust rollist ja kohalikest majanduspoliitikatest;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knows the basics of law regarding local municipalities in the economics field.
A student who has passed the course can:
*	Understand the cause and effect of economic-political decisions;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Mõista majanduspoliitiliste otsuste põhjuseid ja tagajärgi;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Evaluate the impact of different economic-political fields to entrepreneurship, local government and central government;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Seostada majanduspoliitika erinevate valdkondade mõju ettevõtlusele, kohalikule omavalitsusele ja keskvalitsusele;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Evaluate the application of different models and approaches in the context of different levels of government in Estonia;
learning_outcomes.et: *	Hinnata erinevate teooriate mudelite ja lähenemiste rakendamist Eesti erinevate valitsemise tasandute kontekstis;

learning_outcomes.en: *	Navigate transitional economy models in modern context;
*	Differentiate local government legal issues on other levels.
learning_outcomes.et: *	Eristada kohaliku omavalitsuse õigusküsimusi teistest tasandites.
